mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(c.lec_os_code) FROM wt_course AS c WHERE c.lec_os_code = #{lecOsCode};

SELECT los.lec_os_code AS 'lecOsCode' ,los.lec_name AS 'lecName' ,los.mr_teacher_id AS 'mrTeacherId' ,mr.mr_name AS 'mrTeacherName' ,lrt.lec_starttime AS 'lecStartTime' ,lrt.lec_endtime AS 'lecEndTime' ,lrt.lec_designation AS 'lecTimeName' ,lrr.lec_designation AS 'lecRoom' ,los.lec_day AS 'lecDay' ,lrl.lec_designation AS 'lecLevel' ,los.lec_tuition AS 'lecTuition' , (SELECT COUNT(c.lec_os_code) FROM wt_course AS c WHERE c.lec_os_code = #{lecOsCode}) AS 'lecApplyCount' ,los.cla_capacity AS 'lecClaCapacity' ,los.lec_st_date AS 'lecStartDate' ,los.lec_fin_date AS 'lecFinalDate' ,los.lec_os_writer AS 'lecOsWriter' ,los.lec_os_reg_date AS 'lecOsRegDate' FROM wt_lecture_open_schedule AS los INNER JOIN wt_member_registration AS mr ON los.mr_teacher_id = mr.mr_id LEFT JOIN wt_lec_resource AS lrt ON los.lec_time_code = lrt.lec_number LEFT JOIN wt_lec_resource AS lrr ON los.lec_room_code = lrr.lec_number LEFT join wt_lec_resource AS lrl ON los.lec_level_code = lrl.lec_number
SELECT mr.mr_id AS mrTeacherId ,mr.mr_name AS mrTeacherName FROM wt_member_registration AS mr WHERE mr.level_num = 2;
SELECT lr.lec_number AS 'lecLevel' ,lr.lec_designation AS 'lecLevelName' FROM wt_lec_resource AS lr WHERE lr.lec_number LIKE CONCAT('%','level','%');
SELECT lr.lec_number AS 'lecRoom' ,lr.lec_designation AS 'lecRoomName' FROM wt_lec_resource AS lr WHERE lr.lec_number LIKE CONCAT('%','room','%');

SELECT lr.lec_number AS 'lecTime' ,lr.lec_designation AS 'lecTimeName' ,lr.lec_starttime AS 'lecStartTime' ,lr.lec_endtime AS 'lecEndTime' FROM wt_lec_resource AS lr WHERE lr.lec_number LIKE CONCAT('%','time','%');
